title: Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 11
description:
Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 11:

We have 35 titles in this upload:

-  Albert - Realizing Hope; Life Beyond Capitalism (2006)

-  Althusser - On the Reproduction of Capitalism; Ideology and Ideological State Apparatuses (2014)

-  Amin - The Implosion of Contemporary Capitalism (2013)

-  Barkham - Real Estate and Globalisation (2012)

-  Benedek et al (Eds.) - Economic Globalisation and Human Rights (2007)

-  Boltanski & Chiapello - The New Spirit of Capitalism (2007)

-  Brown - Beyond the Crash; Overcoming the First Crisis of Globalization (2010)

-  Buckman - Globalization, Tame It or Scrap It (2004)

-  Chorafas - Capitalism Without Capital (2009)

-  Dillon & Cannon - Circle of Greed (2010)

-  Dullien et al - Decent Capitalism; a Blueprint for Reforming Our Economies (2011)

-  Flaschel & Greiner - A Future for Capitalism; Classical, Neoclassical and Keynesian Perspectives (2011)

-  Flaschel & Luchtenberg - Roads to Social Capitalism; Theory, Evidence, and Policy (2012)

-  Gilens - Affluence & Influence; Economic Inequality and Political Power in America (2012)

-  Hanieh - Lineages of Revolt; Issues of Contemporary Capitalism in the Middle East (2013)

-  Hayward - Ego Check; Why Executive Hubris Is Wrecking Companies and Careers, and How to Avoid the Trap (2007)

-  Homer & Sylla - A History of Interest Rates; 4e (2005)

-  Kornai - Dynamism, Rivalry, and the Surplus Economy; Two Essays on the Nature of Capitalism (2014)

-  Maksakovsky - The Capitalist Cycle; an Essay on the Marxist Theory of the Cycle (2006)

-  Mann - Disassembly Required; a Field Guide to Actually Existing Capitalism (2013)

-  Mattick - Business as Usual; the Economic Crisis and the Failure of Capitalism (2011)

-  Moon - Dilemmas of International Trade, 2e (2000)

-  Muzio - The Capitalist Mode of Power; Critical Engagement with the Power Theory of Value (2014)

-  O'Brien (Ed.) - Governing the Corporation; Regulation and Corporate Governance in an Age of Scandal and Global Markets (2005)

-  Oppenheimer - Crazy Rich; Power, Scandal and Tragedy Inside the Johnson & Johnson Dynasty (2013)

-  Shutt - Beyond the Profits System; Possibilities for a Post-Capitalist Era (2010)

-  Shutt - The Trouble with Capitalism; an Enquiry into the Causes of Global Economic Failure (1998)

-  Sotiropoulos et al - A Political Economy of Contemporary Capitalism and Its Crisis; Demystifying Finance (2013)

-  Taylor - Negative Capitalism; Cynicism in the Neoliberal Era (2013)

-  Trout - The Price of Paradise; the Costs of Inequality and a Vision for a More Equitable America (2013)

-  Washington - Deadly Monopolies; the Shocking Corporate Takeover of Life Itself-and the Consequences for Your Health.. (2011)

-  Watters - Crazy Like Us; the Globalization of the American Psyche (2010)

-  Wicks-Lim & Pollin (Eds.) - Capitalism on Trial; Explorations in the Tradition of Thomas E. Weisskopf (2013)

-  Wolff - Occupy the Economy; Challenging Capitalism (2012)

-  Yagi et al (Eds.) - Crises of Global Economies and the Future of Capitalism; Reviewing Marxian Crisis Theory (2013)
